remarks: Lemma for ~ cphsubrg .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphsubrglem.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphsubrglem.1 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s A ) ) $.
cphsubrglem.2 $e |- ( ph -> F e. DivRing ) $.
cphsubrglem $p |- ( ph -> ( F = ( CCfld |`s K ) /\ K = ( A i^i CC ) /\ K e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) ) ) $.
